projects.title: Village Information System
projects.description: Integrated platform for managing village administration data and digital community services.
projects.fullDescription: The Village Information System is a comprehensive solution designed to help village governments manage administrative, financial, and community service data. This system facilitates transparency and public participation through easy access to information.

projects.title: Department Information System
projects.description: Academic data and student management system for university departments.
projects.fullDescription: This system is specifically designed to help university departments manage academic, student, and research data. With an intuitive interface, this system makes it easy for lecturers and administrative staff to carry out daily tasks.

projects.title: Car Rental System
projects.description: Car rental booking and management platform with tracking and online payment features.
projects.fullDescription: The Car Rental System is an end-to-end solution for rental businesses that integrates fleet management, online booking, digital payments, and GPS tracking. This system is designed to improve operational efficiency and customer experience.

projects.title: EduTrack - Student Attendance App
projects.description: Mobile application for real-time student attendance monitoring with QR Code and geofencing technology.
projects.fullDescription: EduTrack is an innovative solution for student attendance monitoring that integrates QR Code technology, geofencing, and real-time tracking. This application reduces manual attendance administration and improves attendance data accuracy with real-time monitoring access for parents and schools.

projects.title: Automatic Course Scheduling System
projects.description: Intelligent solution for generating automatic course schedules with optimization algorithms.
projects.fullDescription: This system uses genetic algorithms to automatically generate optimal course schedules, considering constraints such as room availability, lecturers, and time slots. The system reduces schedule conflicts and improves resource utilization efficiency.

projects.title: Classroom Monitoring System
projects.description: IoT platform for real-time monitoring and management of classroom usage.
projects.fullDescription: This system integrates IoT sensors for real-time monitoring of classroom usage, including presence detection, equipment usage, and environmental conditions. The collected data is analyzed for room usage optimization and energy savings.

projects.title: Inventory Management System
projects.description: Complete inventory management solution with barcode scanning and real-time stock reporting.
projects.fullDescription: The Inventory Management System is a comprehensive platform for managing assets and inventory. With barcode scanning features, item movement tracking, and automatic stock notifications, this system helps organizations optimize their inventory management.

projects.title: Quiz Test Question System
projects.description: Platform for creating and managing online exams with various question types and result analytics.
projects.fullDescription: This system provides an end-to-end solution for creating, managing, and conducting online exams. With various question types, anti-cheating systems, and comprehensive result analytics, this system is suitable for educational and training institutions.
